definitions.definition: That which distinguishes; a single occurrence of a determining factor or feature, the fact of being divided; separation, discrimination.
The act of distinguishing, discriminating; discrimination.
definitions.example: There is a distinction to be made between resting and slacking.

definitions.definition: Specifically, a feature that causes someone or something to stand out as being better; a mark of honour, rank, eminence or excellence; being distinguished.
definitions.example: She had the distinction of meeting the Queen.
